title: Roaring Kitty Returns: GameStop Stock Up 400% in One Week
shortdescription: Keith Gill posts first tweet in 3 years — meme stock mania returns bigger than 2021.
description: GME squeezes short sellers for $8B in losses as retail traders pile in — déjà vu of 2021 but with 10x volume.
author: Mark Blaze

title: REITs Crash 35% in 2025: Is It Time to Buy the Dip?
shortdescription: Office and mall REITs hit decade lows — but data centers and industrial soaring.
description: VNQ down 35% YTD while data center REITs like DLR and EQIX hit all-time highs — biggest sector divergence ever.
author: Mark Blaze

title: Gold ETF vs Physical Gold: Which Wins in 2025? (Shocking Results)
shortdescription: GLD up 48% while physical gold premiums hit record 12% — storage costs eating returns.
description: Costco sells $2B in gold bars but investors lose 8–10% annually on storage/insurance — ETFs now clearly superior.
image: /images/Gold ETF vs Physical Gold 2025 Shocking Results.webp
author: Mark Blaze
